message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.CC, cs.SI, cs.MM

Reasoning: The paper deals with the wiretap channel model, which is a classic problem in information theory and falls under the category of information theory (cs.IT). The paper also addresses the issue of achieving secrecy capacity, which is a key concern in cryptography and security (cs.CR). The use of polar codes, a popular coding technique in communication theory, suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-category of coding theory (cs.CC). The extension of the construction to broadcast channels with confidential messages may also make the paper relevant to the sub-categories of signal processing (cs.SI) and multimedia (cs.MM).
